text: Tonny Bruins Slot (1 April 1947 â€“ 1 November 2020) was a Dutch association football manager. He was known for his role as assistant manager and scout for AFC Ajax. On 1 November 2020, Bruins died at the age of 73. ==References== Category:1947 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Dutch football managers Category:Sportspeople from Amsterdam Category:AFC Ajax managers
